scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd "../../../Part 2 - Communicating with Server/Exercises 2.6 - 2.11 + Exercises 2.15 - 2.20/phonebook" && npm run build && cp -r build "../../../Part 3 - Programming a Server with NodeJS and Express/Exercises 3.1 - 3.11 + Exercises 3.13 - 3.21/phonebook"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
